page.title: 10ASPULL CHURCH SCHOOL.
page.content: Our school was built during 1982. Id Anglican/Methodist school. It replaced 3 old church schools which were built in the eighteenth and nineteenth centuries and is built on the site of an old Grammar school which is mentioned as existing in the mid eighteenth century. Aspull Methodist school was built in 1858, now it is used for a playgroup and a dancing class as well as being the Methodist Church Sunday School and Church Hall. St. Elizabeths C.E. School was built in 1876 and is now used as a Parish Hall and lots of activities are carried on there. Aspull C.E. School , built in 1868 has been knocked down and four houses are being built on the site.
